name: County Jail
long_description: Bars on all sides, thin mattress, and a musty blanket. And worst of all, no tech in sight! Call it time served so you can get out of here already.
short_description: Bored already. This is worse than being grounded for sure!

room_features.name: Personal Affects Counter
room_features.description: "Here's your crap, kid. Stay outta trouble.", says the cop through the glass.

room_features.name: Unattended Police Computer
room_features.description: Somebody forgot to log out... Don't they learn this stuff in the Academy?
